Text: Thank you very much! Great! God bless you!

Can you tell me where you get the 'classic' packs that you've uploaded? (not this torrent, but the ones from 2001, 2002 etc)

I've only downloaded about 10 'packs' that you've shared with us, and I get the feeling that i've missed a lot more since i've joined the party late.

I would really love to watch some of the earlier eps as much as possible. Thanks!
I'll upload more classics within the week....

That would be great and most appreciated, mdprosser.

 However, if you don't mind me asking, it is intriguing for me to know if there is a site where I can download a lot more of the early last decade seasons? (you can email me invy84 at gmail if you'd feel more comfortable this way)

Since I understand you probably wouldn't want to re-seed them again, as it is a lot to seed. Although I would seed them for months on end.
